Unique leveling system: Can equip one perk at a time per wave. Can level all perks no matter what perk you have equiped.
90% of weapons are free: Premium content doesn't raise stats aside from 3 or 4 weapons
All maps are avaiable upon purchase: Including the latest maps just released summer 2014

It never gets old with a ton of different maps! I recommend this game to all FPS fans because this game will make it worth the money.

Good game, bought it on sale. Its better than COD zombies in my opinion simply because you dont have run around like crazy and play tag with the zombies. You can also customize the game from short to long. A regular short game is about 10 minutes with 5 waves. At the end you will face a boss. The game also a class system called "perks which gives you bonuses with different types of weapons.

Metascore doesn't do the justice, this game is epic. I was weary of buying it because I saw the rather low score it got, but when it went on sale for $4.99, I decided to give it a try. The result? Loads of weapons, plenty of maps, a fun (but annoyingly long) ranking system, solo and multiplayer support, VAC security, Mods, and too much more for me to list. I've had the game for 2 days and already logged a lot of time on it. I'd definitely recommend this game.
Potato is the best weapon in the game. 11/10

love playing the game with my partner slient viper we have so much fun and what a better game to play then killing floor i highly recommend it to anyone whos a beginner of steam as i am its rather easy to play W is for walk right click on the mouse is to fire the gun R is for reload 5 is for health and 5 again is for welding the doors 1 is for the knife 2 is for the pistol 3 is for heavy guns like flame thrower shot gun etc. and E for open and close the doors G is grenades left click on the mouse is to zoom in and out and to move around is to move the mouse around and lastly E again is when u trade like going to the trade for guns if u want anymore help please dont b affriad to messege me and add me would love to have more team mates

Не так давно я наткнулся на игру Killing Floor, и признаюсь, что с самого начала у меня было скептическое мнение.
Ну чем может заинтересовать и без того надоевший жанр, шутер про зомби…
Тем более от мало известной студии которая сделала Red Orchestra 2: Heroes of Stalingrad, который для меня безнадежно провалился.
Но все-таки сев за Killing Floor, я не мог отлипнуть от экрана часа три, и я все поражался, как люди могли сделать игру, которой уже лет пять, и она до сих пор популярна и так проколоться на Red Orchestra!?
Геймплей)
В Killing Floor он прост как две копейки, ничего заумного, ваш отряд должен отбивать орды разной нечисти, а потом закупаться новым оружием и патронами, и потом опять отстреливать орды нежити.
Вопрос что же здесь интересного?
А то, что монстры все разные, у них действительно разное поведение способности и т. д.
И очень приятно то, что сделали отличную стрельбу из автоматов действительно тяжеловато стрелять, спасают только пистолеты где не такая сильная отдача 
Так же важно выбрать именно свой класс, когда я только начал играть я выбрал на бум о чем довольно сильно пожалел, играть было тяжело все время чувствовал себя не уютно в этом персонаже, пока просто не полазил в настройках и не выбрал для себя что-либо подходящее.

Killing Floor, man oh man, where do i start?
-It's got great gameplay
-Teamwork is vital
-Patriarch
-Dosh
-A bunch of other nice things

Gameplay and Graphics:
This game has awesome gameplay. You can solo maps if you are really good. If not, grab a few buddies and play together. It also has a wave limit, up to 10 long waves is the maximum. The shooting is great, so is melee. In this game, you can self heal and heal others. Self healing is not as effecient as healing a teammate. The graphics aren't anything special. I mean, for a 2009 mod-turned game, it's pretty good looking!

Gore and Class/Leveling:
The game is well known for having gore. Heads coming off and bodies being blown to bits. Its pretty interesting. Also, they are so dedicated to good kills that they made a mechanic called Zed time. Zed time puts slo-mo into the game for all players for a short time. This allows for some life saving stunts. The classes are pretty interesting. Though its effecient to use class oriented weaponry, you can give a sharpshooter a shotgun and a chainsaw and they could still pull it off.

Story:
Nothing to see here...

Overall: 
Get this game, if you don't want to pay $20, its frequently on discount for $5. Also get Killing Floor 2.
10/10 would rush a scrake again.

This game's netcode is great, works really well and the multiplayer has dedicated servers.
